abstract: The Danaher Corporation said Thursday it had agreed to buy ChemTreat, a water treatment products and services provider, for $435 million. ChemTreat, based in Glen Allen, Va., had more than $200 million in revenue in its most recent fiscal year. The company focuses on boiler, cooling water and industrial waste water applications.
